title: Barclays vs RBS | SSE | Bangalore/SG
content:
Hi Folks

I received an international offer after trying for a long time. I was happy as i had tried many other companies where i cleared all rounds but they didnt proceed ahead for offer after Hr rounds. But now after seeing sky high rents in SG i am having second thoughts about moving abroad. So looking for some insights from the community here about the pros & cons between these offers like where i might be able to save more, future prospects etc.

Also if ppl who are in SG can shed some light on the scenario there for immigrants, how's the culture, visa issues etc.


**Offer 1**
Education: B.Tech non-CS tier 1
YoE: 8
Current: bulge bracket IB
Current TC: 42 lpa
Date of the Offer: Spring 2022
Company: Barclays
Title/Level: SSE
Location: Singapore
Salary: SGD 142000 
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: Performance-based bonus, acc. to them can goto 20% (but i doubt it will go north of 10%)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~S$ 155k
Benefits: standard IB benefits, nothing different

**Offer 2**
Date of the Offer: Spring 2022
Company: RBS
Title/Level: SSE
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 49 lpa (fixed) 
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 1 lac
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: Performance-based bonus, acc. to them can goto 20%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 49 lpa + variable
Benefits: standard IB benefits, nothing different

title: Texas Instruments | Engineer ( G26 ) | Banglore
content:
Today I got an offer from Texas Instruments,

* Education: B.Tech in CSE from NIT Durgapur
* Years of Experience: 2 Years 9 months
* Prior Experience: Wipro (6 months) Qualcomm(2 Years 3 months)
* Prior Compensation : Base : 12.5 L, Bonus : 3L, Stocks:- 10K usd vested over 3 years,
* Previous TC :- 17.9 L (For current Year)
* Date of the Offer: June 2022
* Company: Texas Instruments
* Title/Level: Engineer (Same as SDE 2 )
* Location: Banglore
* Salary: INR 2600000
* Relocation: Reimbursment of All Bills
* Signing Bonus:INR 500000 (First Year) + INR 500000 (Second Year)
* Stock bonus: $10k USD vested over 4 years (25% Each year)
* Bonus: Performance-based bonus 20% of Base [5.2L] every year.
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 26L+5L+5.2L+2.6L (10K USD / 4 converted to INR) ~ 38.8 Lakhs (for first year), 38.8L(second year), 33.3L (3rd Year) 
* Benefits: Health Insurance, Meal Card, Internet reimbursments, Car Lease Policy, Fuel reimbursments etc
* Other details: Negotiated once, original offer was 24L as base. I have been given 2 days to accept or decline the offer.
* Other Offer: I got offer from Rizzle https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/2122662/Rizzle-or-Engineer-(L4)-or-Hyderabad
* Initialy I gave them rizzle offer and then asked them to match it. They gave much better offer. Then rizzle matched the offer and then I asked TI to match it again so got 26 Base.
 * Interview Experineces:
	* [ **TEXAS INSTRUMENTS** ] https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/2132111/Texas-Instruments-or-SDE-2-(G26)-or-Banglore-or-Accepted
	* [ **AMAZON** ] https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/2099774/Amazon-or-SDE1-or-Hyderabad-or-May-2022-Reject
	* [ **RIZZLE** ] https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/2123926/Rizzle-or-SDE-2-or-Hyderabad-or-Offered

title: Gojek | L1 | Bangalore
content:
* Education: Non-Circuital
* Years of Experience: ~1
* Prior Experience: Analyst
* For fresh grad, any related Internship/coop experience? - No
* For experienced engineer, what's your current and past experience? - 
* Date of the Offer: - May 2022
* Company: - Gojek
* Title/Level: - L1
* Location: - Bangalore
* Salary: - 22LPA
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1L JB, [ relocation - 1 month stay + transportation charges + 1 way tickets (when required) ]
* Stock bonus: - $8k worth stock options vested over 4 years
* Bonus: 20% of base (4.4L) for 5/5 rating (3/5 will give ~10% i.e. 2.2L)
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~31L (includes ~50k gratuity amount)
* Benefits: Health insurance (6L), Life insurance (65L), and Group Accident insurance (6 X CTC) all covered by the company.
* Other details: 12% employer contribution to PF (that is ~1.3L, which is good as it's not taxable) + 54k worth reimbursements related to Mobile, Internet, Books.
* Already had an offer of 26LPA (it included insurance premiums though, Gojek didn't do that). Didn't negotiate much, as I thought given my background it's more than enough :p

I'd like to thank entire Leetcode community, your posts and comments directly or indirectly helped me reach here.

title: Offer Eval : PhonePe vs GoJek
content:
Education: BE (CS), Mumbai
Years of Experience: 7.5
Last Company: Zomato, Backend, 2.5 years
Last Drawn Pre-tax Salary: 44 LPA INR (Base)

Took an unemployment gap/break of 4 months - used it for some rest, some travel & ample preparation besides improving health.
Have following 2 offers in Pune :

1. Company: Gojek/GoToFinancial
Title/Level: Lead Software Engineer
Location: Pune
Salary: 56 LPA INR (Base)
Joining Bonus: 5 LPA INR
Retention Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: $45k vested over 4 years, ~8L per year (already listed)
Performance Bonus: upto 11L (~20% of base), expecting 10%, ~6L per year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): (56 + 5 + 8 + 6) = 75 LPA

2. Company : PhonePe
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Pune
Salary: 54 LPA INR (Base)
Joining Bonus: 7 LPA INR (at end of 1st month)
Retention Bonus: 7 LPA INR (at end of 13th month)

Performance Bonus: 0 (standard at startups I guess as they talk about potentially huge hikes)

C. Do you think it is too low given my experience? If yes, What range should I target/negotiate?
D. Any other companies I should apply to that offer a better compensation in Mumbai/Pune?

Thanks in advance!
